Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've found that I can't store more than 10 subassemblies in the VAB before the list starts to flow off the page, and there's no obvious way to scroll said list (e.g. mousewheel has no effect). Does anybody know a way to use long subassembly lists?

Edited March 31, 2014 by Starstrider42
Look for a page arrow at the bottom of the page, the same as the arrows on the other pages which have more than one page (such as propulsion or construction tabs).
D'oh! Didn't notice the button lurking under the subassembly drop area. Thanks!
